ðŸ“– Summary: fish-ai is a Fish shell plugin that integrates Large Language Models (LLMs) to provide AI-powered assistance for shell scripting. It enables users to convert natural language comments into commands, fix broken commands, and get intelligent command autocompletion, all accessible via keyboard shortcuts.
